mapper.select: select count(id) from user where id = #{id}
select * from user where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select CODE_TYPE, CODE_TYPE_NAME, COMMENTS, ITEM1, ITEM2 from lisc001 order by CODE_TYPE
select CODE, ITEM1, ITEM2, ITEM3, ITEM4, ITEM5, REMARK1, REMARK2 from lisc002 order by CODE_TYPE

select * from lisc001
where CODE_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{searchval},'%')
order by CODE_TYPE
mapper.update: UPDATE lisc002 SET ITEM1 = #{item1}, ITEM2 = #{item2}, ITEM3 = #{item3}, ITEM4 = #{item4}, ITEM5 = #{item5}, REMARK1 = #{remark1}, REMARK2 = #{remark2} WHERE CODE_TYPE = #{codeType} AND CODE = #{code};

UPDATE lisc003 SET ITEM1 = #{item1}, ITEM2 = #{item2}, ITEM3 = #{item3}, ITEM4 = #{item4}, ITEM5 = #{item5}, REMARK1 = #{remark1}, REMARK2 = #{remark2} WHERE CODE_TYPE = #{codeType} AND CODE = #{code} AND CODE2 = #{code2};
